ComicInfo.Summary: Join our Heroes as they desperately try and defend the subterranean entrance to the mysterious Eganko mountain. With Eastern armies already engaged with the bulk of the Dataran forces, only our heroes stand between Aalok and the Darklyte armor. Trapped between an advance force of Datarans led by Aalok himself from the south, and a horde of demons from the north, our heroes must defend the mountain until help arrives, or die trying.

ComicInfo.Title: A Call to Arms
